content.detailedDescription:
There have been a continuous number of strange looking type objects flying thru middle tennessee for some time now. these anomalies appear to exhibit more characteristics of a biologic nature... rather than the expected mechanized limitations of modern day aerial craft. were it not for the fact that my camera validates all which i am seeing... i probably would not believe my own eyes!

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
nashville
content.summary: Strange ufo bioforms over nashville.

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were watching tv in our living room with our front door open (north side of the house), since i've been seeing alot of strange objects lately, i've been really paying close attention to the sky. i just happened to look through the window on our front door and saw a bright orange light, im guessing around 1,000 feet above the ground, and appeared to be stationary. i jumped up off the couch and told my dad to come look at this, i had a camera in my pocket because we had some friends over earlier, but another reason i kept it with me was just incase if i witnessed another ufo i would have a camera with me. the object did not stay very long, maybe two seconds at the best. i got outside and the object was gone, so i waited, and waited, and waited, for about 20 or 30 minutes, then i decided to go back inside. about 20 minutes later, we were sitting in the living room watching tv, and i kept glancing over hoping to see the object again, and to my luck, i eventually saw it again, i flew off the couch and told my dad "there it is again!" and this time he saw it, he was not sure what it was either, it was not a flare because f16's usually practice dogfights over our house and sometimes they drop flares, they tend to move slowly and flicker, but this thing did'nt do anything like that. it was stationary and was a constant light, and it was visible about two seconds, but flares usually last longer than that, maybe 15 or 20 seconds, there were also no jets in the area at the time, so i'm not going to consider it a flare. unfortunately, since the object lasted only a few seconds, i was'nt able to get any photos.
content.summary: Orange orb about 1,000 feet above the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
20100904
2258 mst 
tucson az

i had stepped out onto the balcony of my apartment to get some air, watching the sky as i frequently do.
i observed two bright red strobelights with one small green light (steady) between them.  strobes were very slow, 1/ second, alternating, left, right, left, right, both, right, left, right, left, both, repeat, which is what made me notice them in the first place. object apperared in mid air ssw and proceeded nw at moderate pace until disappearing behind apartment building, which was also closest point of approach. 
i at first believed it to be a military aircraft out of davis monthan afb, but the unusual light configuration made clear very quickly it was not and a-10, f-16, c-130, or c-17, or any other aircraft i routinely see flying in and out of dm. 
object appeared to be paralleling course of i-10. at cpa, obect was between size of birthcontrol pill at arms length and size of aspirin at arms length.  i would estimate speed at 100 to 150 knots, altitude approximately 5000 ft agl.  
5-10 seconds before cpa, i was able to hear very deep hum similar to turboprop aircraft, but bass rather than the usual tenor sound. 
object lights did not conform with any known light patterns of aircraft in my experience. i have been a sky watcher and aircraft aficianado since childhood, and am a student pilot on extended hiatus until finances improve.  i was unfortunately, not able to determine the shape of the object, as the strobes were incredibly bright, creating a contrast with the dark sky which was impenetrable. however i was able to observe the object occlude stars twice along its flight path proving that it had some sort of mass and structure.
this may have been some sort of military aircraft, perhaps a uav.  still, it was unknown and flying, so i am reporting it.  i would post pics except that when i ducked inside to grab the camerai found that the camera batteries were still in the charger at the time.  oops! 

for some odd reason, i have been having just a little bit of an adrenaline reaction to this event, which is highly unusual for me.  

ps i will prepare a sketch of the scene and illustrate the objects course, however, i do not have time at the moment as i want to get this narrative downdown while it is fresh in my mind.
content.summary: Unknown light configuration over tucson, unable to identify.

content.detailedDescription:
Came home from work looked up with my binoculars at 1118pm i think i had the directions wrong last night. the first one i saw was (is) in the northeast facing east, the brighter (closer one) is in the southeast facing west.  they are not moving 
last night they both moved quite alot from where i saw them originaly. 

i went to the same place i was when my grandson his girl friend and my son 
saw them.
they are all asleep right now.
had no trouble picking them out .  they look almost like stars but once i watch them i can see a little difference.
when i was on break at worki faced my car where they would be and could see one even though i could see no stars from work.

i think the one that was (is) southeast chased something last night.
from the flames-plasma whatever it was moving fast now it is just stationary
content.summary: Second night in a row pointy triangle white center red blue tips not lights plasma like one north west more west one south west more west not moving yet tonight.

content.detailedDescription: Orange glow under, every time i moved my attention, iit moved to another location on it's trayectory.
content.summary: Triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
We were star gazing as a family, in front of our home this evening.  i had dialed jupiter in on the telescope, and was showing the kids the moons, etc.  while they were busy observing jupiter i looked up directly over head, just to occupy myself and scan the sky.  at this point i noticed, what i thought was two airplanes.  however, after a few seconds i realized that these two objects were moving in synch with one another, one in front of the other.  i asked my wife to look up to see this phenomena, which she did and was also able to see them.  i was totally excited, and felt very hyper.  they started to dim, i asked that she keep an eye on them while i ran to get my neighbor.  i figured he was important as i know he has an interest in ufos.  by the time we got back, about 30 seconds later, my wife had said they faded out.  they were moving in a northern direction, almost due north, perhaps a little north east.

i have no photos or videos.
content.summary: Star gazing with the family, looking at jupiter. looked up directly over head, just to scan the scan. noticed two moving objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on the deck with my family at dusk when my wife noted, "look at those planes" to my daughter. i moved to see them expecting to see military planes which fly over often from nearby fort carson and instead saw two cigar shaped craft with no wings flying side by side. we all watched them fly from east to west over the maontains at a very high altitude over the clouds. they flew in the same manner and appeared to be the same size as two 747's cruising at 30-40,000 ft - except they lacked wings. they made absolutely no sound. even when jets cruise over at 35,000 ft, you can hear them out here. we watched for about 45 seconds as they disappeared over the mountains. it fely very strange as they did not appear like any planes we had ever seen before.
content.summary: Two white cigar shaped craft observed at high altitude (30-40,000 ft) travelling side by side movin from east to west. no sound and no wings.

content.detailedDescription: Hi, my name is erica and i'm not sure exactly how to go about this, but here goes. last week my girlfriend told me a story about how a few days before she was driving down ransom rd. duryea pa. and she saw some green flash of light coming from the tree line. so she had me look it up because she believed it was some ufo or something because she said she could see the source of the light one second and then it was just gone. after i looked it up i came across a bunch of things about the "green flash" that comes from the sun at sun up/down. until last night i thought that's what it had to be. well last night we were driving through ransom again(not in the same section)  and in the complete darkness like right in front of us there was a green little bit of light, like a lazor pointer, and then we drove under it and it was like i don't even know how to explain it, it was almost like it expanded over the car or something and then it was gone. like a quick strobe light, of green all through the car. it was like it came from straight above us.  i figured i should let someone know about it, it's the 2nd time it's happened. thanks for your time and sorry if this is just me being dumb.
content.summary: Green strobe/laser light lit up the car from above.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was driving and i was her passenger as we were driving on i55 going west to the weber road exit. i was looking toward the front of the vehicle at the wispy clouds against the royal blue sky. when i noticed around the 1 o'clock position in the shy ahead of us. what i determined to be a jet fighter and its com trial. what i noticed was the speed at which the object was moving at. which i perceived as moving faster than normal across the sky. as the object moved almost 3/4 of the way across in front of me i realized that what i was seeing was not what i had originally perceived. the chemtrail never got any longer or shorter and moved right along with whatever was creating it. in fact from my view all i really seen was this line in the sky moving along in front of me in a straight line. it size was approximately 1 1/2 to 2 inches long and all moved together as one.

when it went past a puff cloud and came out again it seemed to just stop there on the right side of the cloud and just hang there for 45 seconds or so before once again moving off to the right at its previous slow constant speed. it continued till it got to a cluster of clouds on my right and a tree came into view and blocked my sight for a second. just long enough for me to have lost sight of the object. i never was able to locate it gain after that.
content.summary: It looked like a very high flying military jet with a single com trail.

content.detailedDescription: (hopefully) following is a slide show of the many pics i downloaded while watching a real time event on santa cesarea's webcam #2 on september 4, 2010.  mufon, i apologize if this download doesn't work and i won't bother you again, if it doesn't.  (fyi, i am a mufon member.)
content.summary: Last attempt at downloading a slide show of santa cesarea's ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from a class i attended in salt lake city.  it was around 9:20 in the evening. (approx.)  i turned off 6200 s. and onto 4800 w going south and as i passed the gas station i noticed a reddish-orange light hovering above our park.  (this park is a "depressed" park.  that's where all the water goes after it rains.  at this time there was a little bit of water, but not much.)  i thought it was a helicopter as we do have a small airport by our nieghborhood, but i thought it was strange for it to be just hovering there.  i drove a little further towards it and decided to stop and see what it really was.  i pulled over, turned off my music, and rolled down my window.  there was no noise coming from it and i could see that it was only maybe 20 yards above the park.  a vw beetle with two teenage girls pulled into the center lane and watched the light for a few seconds, then they drove off.  i was about to drive off when it started to move upwards, going east/slightly north.  i was intending to watch it go back towards the airport, but then it picked up speed and a reddish/orange light (like the one i originally saw) illuminated the object and i could see it was round, not a helicopter or any planes they fly at the airport.  it lit up for maybe a second or two, then took off towards the stars.  i watched it till it disappeared, which only took a matter of seconds.  i sat in my car for a couple more minutes, trying to figure out what i just saw.  i drove home and i was very scared afterwards.  i was very intrigued when i was watching it because at that point (before it was lit up) i thought for sure it was a helicopter.  after it lit up and took off, i knew it wasn't a helicopter.  when i finally got the courage to get out of my car and carry my stuff in the house, i walked in, locked the doors and windows, then proceeded to tell my parents what happened. (i am 26 years old, so i'm no child.)  they were interested and told me it sounded like a ufo.  i didn't want to believe that what it was, but the more i think about it, the more i want to know what it was. my other sister laughed at me and told me i was insane.  i am not insane, as i know what i saw, even though i dont know what it was. i didn't sleep well that night at all.  
if anyone can tell me what it could have been, please let me know.  before this i refused to believe in ufo's, but now i'm not so sure.  thanks for letting me tell you my story.
content.summary: A reddish-orange light and a circular shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
On august 16, 2010 i was in helen georgia while vacationing in the area. at around noon on a clear day with a slight breeze while window shopping alone, i noticed a strange looking bubble move past me and stop. it was about 4 feet off the ground and an inch in diameter.  even though it was strange looking, my initial reaction was to took around me to see if a child was making bubbles with soap and the circular part that dips into the soap then scatters the bubbles. there was no one around me by at least 50 feet. i turned back to look more closely at the bubble. it had not moved and was about 2 feet from me. the first thing i realized is that it was really nothing like a kids bubble although the size was the same. it appeared to be generally clear but to have something that looked dark inside of it to the lower right side. around it's outside there was a wispy undulating haze that extended out about one to two inches all around. as i stared at it, and i should say now that the complete encounter lasted around a minute, it started to disappear and then quickly re-appear. the best description of what they really looked like is from the movie predator with arnold schwartzenager. the alien was in the trees and you could really only see it's vibations when it moved. if you saw the movie, that was very close to what i saw. as a matter of fact, at the time, my mind immediately connected the images.
i leaned forward to get a closer look and it moved about 6 inches away and stopped, and began to appear to shimmer out of focus and begin to disappear. without moving i concentrated on what was left and i remember squinting my eyes and the vision became sharper and it came back to the same shape that it was. i took one small step toward it and again it moved another 6 inches away, stopped and began dissipating again. in order to bring it back into my vision, i had to move my head left and right. somehow this brought out it's details other wise it would appear invisible. again i thought of the predator movie. i then took another small step toward it and again it moved away slightly and stopped and began shimmering. i recall at this time thinking that some kind of intelligent control was at work here. after coming back into full focus, i decided to try to catch it before it could get away. without stepping forward, i cupped my hands and extended my arms until they were just under it and slowly brought them up until i was just a few inches under it. i recall that it made a slightly movement upward and either shot out of sight or just disappeared completely. i stayed in place for about a minute but never saw it again. i am 68 years old, don't drink, or take drugs, have very good eyesight and am not prone to hallucinations. my question to you is, has this type of encounter been reported before?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Tiny 1-inch sphere/bubble seems to hide & definitely avoids capture.

content.detailedDescription:
I have contacted "mufon" with my information a few years back, got no responce from you.  also wrote a letter to mr friedman in maine years ago recieved a form letter request to send $5.00 to him, his object was money, not mine. i called the rochester police dept,that same night, they said they had many call's of sighting's.  also called "pease airforce base, told me there was no active flight's on that night. recienyly went to rochester police station and asked them about the report's they received on the sighting. was told by the dispatcher that the police do not keep record's that long.So i'm letting you know what happened that night, probably for the last time, i am 76 years old.
   my wife and i were driving up rochester hill rd, heading south when i spotted the object just above a tree top on the west side of the road. i stopped the car and asked my wife if she saw it, said she did.  i got out of the car and observed an upside down saucer shaped ufo with different color lights in a circle of windows. i can't remember why we didn't wait for it to leave but we didn't.  it made no sound, did not move but it was there.  we proceded south on then rte. 16, now rte.108 saw it again over an area that used to be an out door theater, much further to the west .Again gong towards madbury nh over the spaulding turnpike overpass, .  my family know's of our experience but we kind of kept it to ourselves for obvious reasons.  excuse the typos. hope i described our experience as to what we saw, hopefully i will hear from you
content.summary: Saucer shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
About eight weeks ago, as i was walking from my car, up the back driveway, to the hotel i work the graveyard shift at, i started noticing a number of lights in the sky encircleing our big island of hawaii.  they were all at the same height, all the same brightness and spaced evenly apart. i thought they might be satellites protecting us from any incoming missles.  sort of like an umbrella. ok with me i thought.  
then, about two weeks ago there appeared a bright star-like object out over the ocean.  i thought it could possibly be two satellites, one behind the other. it was a little higher in the sky then the "umbrella lights". 
last week on my way into work i noticed that the bright star-like object was even brighter.  as i was watching this thing get brighter, a cigar-shaped object with red lights approached the bright star-like object and shot a beam of light down on it, just like a tractor beam from a science fiction movie.  then the red-lighted object blinked out of sight.  the bright star-like object dimmed but remained.  
well, then tonight the bright star-like object got brighter again and one by one the umbrella satellite objects blinked out as they progressed closer to the bright star-like object. the bright star-like object then looked as if it were receeding away from where it was and as if someone gave a command to go to warp speed, it was gone.  
in the end there were no more lit objects that had originally caught my attention. no umbrella satellites, no red cigar-shaped object and no more bright star-like object, just black empty space.
i felt releived, but angry that other people missed the whole thing.
content.summary: Star like thing drawing other smaller stars into it and then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a diamond (square) craft with white florescent glow just west of granville ohio at about 7am. on sept. 4 2010. i knew it was not man made when i saw the rate of speed it was traveling. it was not a meteor as ther was no trail of light following it. the craft was visable above the horizon at about 40 to 45 degrees and dissapeared behind the horizon. it was only visable for about 4 seconds. the square shape of the object and white floresecnt glow is what made this craft so unique.
content.summary: Traveling west on 161 craft shot across sky at high rate about 40* above horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Watching the perseids meteor show out bed room window early morning of the 13th of august and this fireball type thing was going east to west and then the last second turned back to east and disappeared and then after it disappeared a flash happened like when lighting happens but there was no clouds or lighting.It only appeared for a few seconds. just wondering if anyone else saw what i saw i told my dad and he seemed intrigued by it .Im wondering if im sane after i saw that i cant stop thinking of it
content.summary: Streak of fireball took a turn east.

content.detailedDescription: Im driving home from work, it takes me about 2-4 minutes to get home. i'm driving home. i park the car and when i get out i see a bullet/missle/cigar object to the left of me. i was unsure of what it was so i decided to take a picture of it. it was traveling away from me in a diagonal line. i just look up and i see something that does not look like anything i've seen before and i thought about what is was? it then hit me possibly a ufo? it was a rather cloudy night since it rained most of the day.
content.summary: Ufo flying away from me.

content.detailedDescription: i was on ky hwy 52 traveling from lancaster to richmond. i noticed the object just before the hwy 1295 turn to the left. i grabbed my cell phone and called my husband to describe the event to him. the object was under the criss cross pattern of the "com/chem" trails traveling from west to east before making a high speed right angle turn to the north and disappearing. there was an aircraft flying at a high altitude emitting no trail that i noticed shortly after the cigar shaped object disappeared. the object was silver in color perhaps due to the sun reflection. i wonder if anyone else observed this event? i did not feel a threat from the object probably because it happened so fast.
content.summary: Object appeared under chem-trails, traveling extremely fast,, turned at a 90 degree angle, traveled a few seconds and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: More photos from santa cesarea, italy.  please note the website is: (link moved to additional evidence section below--sgonzalez/cms). remember it's ".It" and not ".Com".
content.summary: I didn't know light could bend like this.

content.detailedDescription: More photos to go with prior report.  also, please remember that dates in europe are given day/month/year - a little different from the u.S., so these pics are from sept 4th, not april 9th.
content.summary: More photos from santa cesarea, italy.

content.detailedDescription: A couple of months ago, there was a report on mufon from someone watching webcam #1 from terme santa cesarea, italy, of interesting ufo sightings with photos attached.  since that submittal, i've been watching the cesarea webcam and tonight the ufo's (or whatever they are) put on an incredibe show. to start, please know that the webcam the first reporter submitted (either in june/july '10) was from cesarea webcam #1, and only recently did i learn there is another webcam, #2.  after walking my dog this eve, i remembered (while it's still dark in italy) to see if there was any action going on there. as i rarely watch these cams after 4-5pm mountain time (or 2am in italy), i guess i was missing the real action which i watched tonight at 3:45+am italy time (or whatever the photos list as the exact time).  as i found one youtube video of cesarea's #1 webcam w/ some interesting ufo footage, i hope they put on tonight's footage as well. i downloaded approximately 80 photos from cam#2 tonight, and when you see the pics, you'll know why. and how is what is taking place at sta. cesarea is not hugh news?  all i know is i'm off to santa cesarea first chance i get solely to watch this stuff with night vision goggles.  so you know, the first photo will be a daylight pic of santa cesarea so you know there is nothing there which could explain these phenomena.  and if you wish mufon, you may contact me for all of the pics i downloaded.  the terme santa cesarea website for both webcams is: www.Termesantacesarea.It  lastly, watching the webcam tonight was a little frightening, as i've never seen anything like it in my life - even in a movie.
content.summary: Simply unbelievable 2+ hr ufo show at santa cesarea, italy.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Triangle white center red tip blue tip greenish tips till going on be back
i'm back it is 1254 am .The clouds finally covered them

i went outside to get stuff out of the car before coast to coast started
while outside i noticed what a call a flashy plane the ones that seem
to do the chemtrails at night.  it was in the southwest sky.
then i noticed that there were quite a few stars out,so i was looking at them and one seemed to be very bright and gigleing.
i went in the house to get my binoculars
it was really moving around i figured it was me i don't use them often
i steadyed them on the front porch banister and focused
it was a triangle bright white center blue tip red tip greenish changing color a little tip
as soon as i saw it was clearly a triangle that was micro moving so it looked like it was kind of giggling like in the old movies when the rockets took off  my car alarm went off and scaried the crap out of me for a sec.
i went to get my keys checked the back door quickly and went back out
maybe one minute.  my car arlarm had turned off and my grandson was just
getting out of his car
he has to go past where my car is to get to his driveway
i asked him and his girl friend if they herd my alarm. both said no so i told thenm what i saw 
my grandson look after some prompting.He said it looked like a triangle thats weird his girl friend looked after some coksing.
she said it looked like a triangle.
wh
ile they were looking i saw another one to the northwest i watched it till the clouds covered it .When in at 1254  clouds came out of no where.
my son came home at 110 i took him out the clouds were gone and they were both back only they had both moved  alot because before they were almost right above two different trees. he saw them both got the same impression that he couldn't hold the binoculars still "we all were that way"
when i looked the one in the northwest looked farther away put the same the one in the southwest looked like a white front kind of rounded with what looked almost like flames white front then red then blue like in the old flash gordon movies to show it was moving
content.summary: Bright pulsating star to naked eye rainbow triangle with7x50 binoculars.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a three day report and may be a little long

maricopa, az.
  
day 1   1 sep  skies clear, no moon  time 10:00-10:30pm

being that i was sitting around the house doing nothing and due to my first ever ufo sighting back in may, i decided to go out and try my luck at spotting the ufo again. so i got my camera and went for a drive on route 347 which was around 9:30 pm.  i first went south for a 4 or 5 mile, saw nothing. so i made a u-turn and headed towards phoenix for about 5 mile outside of maricopa, saw nothing. made a u-turn and headed back to maricopa. when i was about a mile outside of maricopa city limits and looking up as i was driving, just off to the left of 347 one of the orange orbs slowly appeared, then went out and came back on again. a split second later a second orb appeared some distance to the left of the first and when back out. then the first orb went out and a third orb appeared just to the right of the first and when back out. not know their actual position, i drove through town on 347 and turn left on n. bowlin rd. (due to the large open area) and parked hoping to get a photo of them if they should reappear. at this location i had a good overall field of view plus i could see the harrah's phoenix ak-chin casino were i first saw the orbs and i hoped they would reappear near the casino. i stayed there for about an hour but i never saw them reappear so i went home for the night. 

day 2   2 sep  skies clear,  no moon  time 9:45-10:00pm

around 9:00 pm headed out of the house with camera hoping to see and maybe get a picture of the orbs. drove back to the bowlin rd. location and waited. about 45 min. goes by, lots of air traffic out of phoenix and over maricopa, but no orbs. so im looking toward phoenix and turn around to look towards the casino to see an orb that looked to be hovering less than a 1000 ft. just over the harrah's phoenix ak-chin casino and then when out. so im happy that i saw the orb but not enough time to get a picture. i waited hoping it would em to reappear. about 15 min. later an orb slowly appeared and then went back out to the left of 347 across from the casino but a little farther out. then a second orb appeared a little to the right of the first and went out. then the third appeared a little right of the second and went out. i had gotten sidetrack trying to light a cigar it and couldnt get my camera turn on in time to take a photo. so i waited hoping for one more chance to take a picture. about 15 min later the first orb slowly reappears to the right of the casino and goes out. the second orb appears (photo 2 nd) and went out. the third orb appears (photo 3 rd) and goes out. so now im real happy, ive got photos of a ufo to backup my 24 may mufon report. being that the ufos were near the casino i drove down 347 and turned left on n. farrell rd. and parked, hoping to get better pictures. i waited about 20 min but no sightings. as i was standing there i happen to look down the road and into the fields on the ak-chin reservation and off to the left of farrell rd. i could see two white shimmering lights that slowly faded out and slowly came back on a few second later. now im thinking the ufo is on the ground, so i drive onto the reservation for a better look and pictures. i found a spot where i could see about five or six of the lights on the ground in the field just behind the house were farrell and thomas st/rd intersect. they were all shimmering, four or five of them would slowly fade in and out of view but never change their location. i also saw a couple of really small light that were moving in the location of the larger lights.  i took a few pictures but most were bad. so im posting the two best that show two light (first picture), then you can see a third starting to come on again. you can also make out some of the other lights. the green blue lights are not part of the craft. after about 15 or 20 min. of looking at the ufo i started out for home. i drove pass a really good spot to get better pictures so i made a u-turn to go back thats when i spot the ak-chin police (someone had called me in) coming from all points. so i pull over and told them what was doing, told them about the ufo sighting, showed they one of the photo and i even pointed out one of the lights of the ufo that faded out and in while we were talking. i was told that either side of the main road was indian property and that i would be trespassing if i left the main road. then i was told to have a nice day they got back into their cars and drove way. i went home to start typing this. it was about 10:50 pm.

 day 3   3 sep  skies clear,  no moon  time 5:45-6:00 am

4:30am wake up for a nap sitting in front of the computer. decide to go to wal-mart to pickup a few things. departed the house 5:05am thought i drive over to the reservation to if the lights were still there from the ufo or maybe it could have been a construction site or something. get to the location no lights, no construction equipment, no construction, no nothing, just green farm land. head out to wal-mart. driving on route 238 towards casa grande coming up on traffic light of intersection 238 and shea way about to make left turn in to wal-mart. light is green.  all of a sudden, out of nowhere, in a knife edge position, in maybe a 30 degree angle traveling at an extreme high rate of speed, in a northeast direction, is a large dark gray or black v shape craft with five white lights, one in the middle and two lights on each wing. it appear too me that it had just taken off from one of the fields to the right of 238. as the craft rolled over to a horizontal position i saw the lights flash then the craft made a hard right turn and disappeared over the horizon. i was in a low part of the road so disappearing over the horizon was an easy task. so i sat through a cycle or two of the traffic light, spellbound. i sapped out of it due to a truck leaving wal-mart and went right pass the wtf moment to the nobody is going to believe this. i wouldnt believe this myself, that all of this could happen to one guy in less the 8 hours. so i drove down 238 a little farther just incase there was more to see. now im on the high side of the road, i can see all over the area. again out of nowhere, in a knife edge position, in maybe a 30 degree angle traveling at an extreme high rate of speed, in a northeast direction, is the craft, which appears to have just taken off. the lights flash again as it rolls horizontal. it makes a hard right turn and heads out to the mountains to the south. it makes a hard left turn (flyby photo) and now heading north back in my direction. once its over or just pass the ak-chin farm complex area, it makes a hard right turn and heads south back to the mountains. it then makes a hard right turn and heads north in my direction and lands (landing photo) in the fields off to the left of the farm complex. its getting pretty light out so im thinking it may clear the area soon. i wait at my location between n. white and parker rd and n. porter rd. for about an hour waiting for it to take off again but it never did or maybe i missed the take off during the passing of one of three frigate trains. i ended the wait and made a right on white and parker and another right on w. peters and nall rd. just to see if i could spot the craft which i didnt. made the loop back wal-mart.

as for the craft i saw. it was v shape dark gray or black and non reflective, taper wing design. i has five white lights evenly spaced, one in the middle and two on each wing which looked to flash when it made its first maneuver. extremely fast with no sound and highly maneuverable. other than the possible knife edge take offs it flew pretty much like any other pitch/roll aircraft just tighter. steep banks with almost wingtip type turns. if youve ever seen a glider do a tight wingtip turn thats what this craft can do only at very high speeds. as for landing i can only assume that it went from fast to dead stop hover and land. it didnt look to really slow down to land. it just made the fast descent and land. i couldnt make out a cockpit or cabin area because it was moving to fast. also i cant remember if i saw the five lights on the underside of the wing because it was moving to fast. i did notice it had what could be blinking nav. lights on the wing tips. it was large but not really overly large but it did have the longest wing span of any aircraft ive even seen. when you look at it head on it pretty thin and almost disappears with the mountain backdrop. i would have to give it a 9 for being a good looking craft as compared to our normal military aircraft that are flying today. sure was something to see. may buy me a camcorder tonight and get back out there by 5am just incase.
 
thats it, you guys can stop reading now. sorry for being so long, for any mistakes you may find and for not getting better pictures. something is better than nothing. i did make a report to include photos to the pinal/maricopa police.
content.summary: Three day report ufo over maricopa az.  1 sep - 3 sep

content.detailedDescription:
i went to the back porch for a smoke and about a minute after looking 
up i saw something unusual. i first noticed the lights moving at a great
speed. the first thing i thought was satelite, it was too fast. there were 3-4 lights on each side making a triangle, might have been 3 with
two in back. the first thing i thought was *(words deleted--sgonzalez/cms). then i had to call my wife. of course i knew she whould not belive me but whatever. i lost sight over a set of trees to the west of me.
content.summary: 6-8 white lights in triangle form.

content.detailedDescription:
Friday august 27th i went to sleep earlier then usual. i woke up feeling something was close to me and when i focused on what was above me,i got scared. i saw what appeared to be the bottom of a ufo. i must have been in the middle of it because i remember seeing the outer edge of it, almost like a half circle and it had blue,red, and green lights. it was hovering over me and all i can remember is feeling scared. when i saw it, i qwikly turned and grabbed my husband and he didnt wake up. i buried my head in his back and thought to myself "dont take me". next thing i know my alarm is going off so i can go to work,and the thoughts of what happened lingered. i told my husband, and he laughed at me. i told a very trusted co-worker and she suggested i report it. since this has happened i have been scared to go to sleep, and when i do sleep, its only for a few hours and then im awake. i had almost convinced myself that what i saw was a dream until i looked on youtube under "ufo sightings in tx" and the same thing i saw was actually recorded by 1 person on the same night, and there was a comment from someone else about seeing a ufo in the mansfield area. how could a ufo be seen on the same night i thought i was dreaming of one? 
i have been debating all day rather i should write this, but tonight is friday, and once again im bothered and scared to go to sleep.
content.summary: I woke up and saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just opened the front door and my 12 year old daughter said theres a ufo. i looked up and to my amazement, saw a huge blue gray ball of light it changes colors and there seemed to be fog around it. i went crazy i started to scream for the rest of my family to grab a camera and fast...Of course every body ran out side to see what the screaming was, because i was just crazy with excitement , at that time my daughter told me there was another one before it, i ran to the street to see it... i was in awe...There was the same blue gray ball moving at the exact same speed...It was like they were attached to each other....They made no sound at all... these things were huge i have seen ufos in the past.. also with witnesses.To see something that big!! this was witnessed by 5 people including the neighbor.  

we are will to take a polygraph...I *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) swear on the holy bible i am telling the truth...These things are real
content.summary: 2 huge grey blue balls of light with no sound witnessed by 5 people.

content.detailedDescription: I attended the omaha air show on offutt air force base and used a nikon digital camera to take pictures of the surprise appearance of a stealth flown in not on the schedule. i didn't see the two unknowns until i downloaded the pictures from the camera to the computer. there is a third oddity on the right hand side of the picture and i had many of these dark blotches in different pictures always at roof line level or higher, some with other definitions indicating structure, possible legs, power source.
content.summary: Omaha air show stealth has two unknowns tailing.

content.detailedDescription:
I am using this form because there was no contact info that i could find. this involves an unidentifiable metal implant found in the cheek of a family member. this was found by parkland hospital in dallas texas via xray and mri. this thing, whatever it is, was not something that we were ever previously told about nor was it anything associated with why he was receiving care at parkland. they noted it several times and did not make any conclusions. parkland made no mention of this thing to us or him. i discovered the reports of the implanted object after getting his medical files from parkland for a private physician. the reports simply state there is a "metalic foreign body present in the right cheek". oddly, the va hospital in dallas made no note whatsoever of the object in their mri or xray reports, yet there are numerous reports in the parkland files. there is no wound accompanying the metal object. our relative cannot feel it and did not know it was there.

this was discovered in may 2010 after he fell at home and the emts took him to parkland where extensive testing was done and then approximately four days later he was transferred by ambulance to the va hospital in dallas.

he is retired now and over the years i have wondered many times if the military implanted something in his body. no, he never was in battle or explosions but his job in the military was top secret. i do know families of military guys who have said civilian hospitals found strange metal implants in such places as the mastoid area of their loved ones.

we really don't know what to think about this or the ufo issues. we just want to know what this thing is and if anyone out there has any information on these implants. at this time we have no idea if it should be included in any surgical removal plan or not. he is old and physically frail now but his mind is clear as a bell, and of course we are wondering if that thing showed up in the films years ago and nobody said anything. i'd like to pull all those records. all of the other metalic items noted on the films such as clamps and wires from heart surgery were correctly and readily identified. not that thing in his cheek. please contact me if you have any info. i'd appreciate it very much. thank you.
content.summary: A question

content.detailedDescription: On patio at 9:04 pm and saw lights in the sky that didn't look familiar. upon further observation, i noticed red, blue, green and gold lights flashing around a glowing light object that was visible at the treeline (so this was in the distance). the flashing of lights seemed like it might be computer generated, but then these small white balls of light shot out both sides of this object. looked to see what time it was and when i looked back, it was gone except for a pie shaped dark silver/black object. all the flashing lights were gone and only dim lights that resembled medium/large running lights were visible on all 3 sides. no noise and flew west at warp speed. it flew through the clouds and illuminated the clouds as it moved -- until it disappeared.
content.summary: Flashing light in sky over ft. worth on 9/2 @ 9pm

content.detailedDescription:
The witness called this in to me today and wants to remain anonymous.  

he went to bed at 12:30 am this morning and was awakened by a bright flash in the room like a camera flash. he opened his eyes and saw a small disc-like ufo in the corner of the room with a large dome on top of it with windows all around the dome.  the disk was a light grey metallic color with black around the windows, it was lighted on the inside and there were no lights on the outside, except the one the kept flashing from the front of the vehicle.  the witness watched the 12" diameter craft move about the room from corner to corner, flashing the strobe-like light (he believes it is a camera of some sort), then it hoovered over his bed.  

he tried to remain as still as possible while shaking his wife and getting her to wake up. she also saw the craft just as it moved into postion near the foot of their bed.  he noticed a very low humming sound. it then moved slowly forward and that is when they saw the tiny beings inside the craft looking out at them - they both sat up in bed and the beings looked surprised, then the craft took off very quickly towards the closet/chimney area and dissappeared.  they could not get a good look at the beings inside the craft, but the witness claims that they had large heads for their small bodies, and they looked humanoid.  all he could see was a kind of grey skin color and he thinks the eyes looked more like human eyes, not large almond shaped eyes that are like the typical greys.  

later, after they had fallen asleep again, the witness again woke up and saw a white-gloved hand floating approximately 10" above his head. he only saw this for a couple of seconds, then it dissappeared. he jumped out of bed to investigate but could find nothing in the room. 

the couple has seen similar things in the past.
content.summary: Small ufo in house with alien beings in windows of craft
